data.title: Ransomware attacks increase by 50% in 2025, with ransom payments decreasing due to regulatory pressure and refusals to pay.
data.description: According to a recent report by Chainalysis, ransomware attackers are facing challenges as they are putting in more effort for less profit. The report indicates that regulatory measures and a growing trend of not paying ransoms have led to a decrease in ransom proceeds for attackers. This shift in strategy has resulted in a decline in profits for ransomware attacks.

data.title: EdgeConneX plans to expand in Sweden with new site in Skellefteå, acquired from Lyten. Part of European data center strategy.
data.description: EdgeConneX®, a company within the EQT portfolio, is planning to grow its presence in Europe by establishing a new data center site in Skellefteå, Sweden. The site, purchased from Lyten, a leader in lithium-sulfur batteries and energy storage, signifies EdgeConneX's ambition to bolster its digital infrastructure capacity throughout the Nordics. This move is part of EdgeConneX's strategic expansion plans in Europe, where it already boasts a significant number of data centers. The acquisition is pending administrative approvals.

data.description: Summary of TRX Price Prediction: In the short term (1 week), TRX is expected to reach $0.29. For the medium term (1 month), the forecast is in the range of $0.30 to $0.32. The bullish breakout level is set at $0.32, while the critical support stands at $0.28.

data.title: Stellar's XLM may see $0.18-$0.20 rebound with mixed signals; bearish MACD and distance from averages advise caution.
data.description: There is a prediction for XLM price to possibly rise towards resistance levels of $0.18-$0.20, despite the presence of bearish MACD and a significant gap from important moving averages. This suggests a need for careful optimism in the market.

data.title: UNI Price Prediction: Targeting $4.28 resistance by March, with current momentum at $3.91 and resistance at $4.10. Technical analysis hints at a potential rally to $4.28 if current levels are surpassed.
data.description: The price prediction for UNI indicates a neutral momentum at $3.91, with a key resistance level at $4.10. Technical analysis points to a possible rally up to $4.28 if current levels are surpassed by bullish activity.

data.title: LINK Price Prediction: $10.50-$12.00 by April 2026 as Chainlink trades at $9.20 with caution for investors.
data.description: Chainlink is currently trading at $9.20, showing a neutral Relative Strength Index (RSI). Analysts have set targets of $10.50-$12.00 for the next 4-6 weeks. However, the bearish Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD) momentum suggests caution for investors of LINK.

data.title: AVAX at $9.38, targets $12-$15 by April 2026. Neutral RSI 48.16. Tech analysis indicates 30-60% upside potential.
data.description: The cryptocurrency AVAX is currently trading at $9.38 with a neutral Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 48.16. Analyzing the technical aspects, there is a predicted 30-60% increase in value, potentially reaching a range of $12 to $15 within the next 4-6 weeks if it can surpass a key resistance level.

data.title: Polkadot aims for $1.76 surge, targeting $1.44-$1.90 in a month. Breakout at $1.76 with support at $1.44.
data.description: Summary for DOT Price Prediction:Current predictions for the DOT cryptocurrency indicate a short-term target of $1.76 within the next week. Looking further ahead, a medium-term forecast places the price within a range of $1.44 to $1.90 over the course of the next month. Analysts have identified $1.76 as a pivotal level for a potential bullish breakout, while emphasizing the importance of maintaining critical support at $1.44.

data.title: Polygon's MATIC eyes $0.45 recovery despite bearish momentum, trading at $0.38. Neutral RSI signals 18% potential upside if key resistance breaks. Technical analysis shows mixed near-term outlook.
data.description: The cryptocurrency MATIC is currently trading at a price of $0.38, while the Relative Strength Index (RSI) is indicating a neutral stance. Analysts predict a potential 18% increase to $0.45 if buyers manage to surpass the crucial resistance level. Technical analysis suggests a somewhat unclear near-future trajectory for Polygon, indicating a mix of positive and negative signals.

data.title: Pearson sees mid-single digit sales growth for 2026, £350m share buyback, 2025 sales at £3.577m vs 2024.
data.description: Anticipating a positive future, projecting mid-single digit sales growth for 2026 and onward. Firm financial standing evident with ongoing £350 million share buyback scheme. On Feb 27, 2026, in London, the company reported financial milestones. In 2025, sales were at £3,577 million, showcasing a solid increase from 2024.

data.title: Price of DOGE expected to reach $0.11-$0.12 by March with support at $0.11. Short-term target: $0.105-$0.110.
data.description: In the latest DOGE price prediction, experts are forecasting a short-term target of $0.105-$0.110 within the next week. Looking ahead to the medium-term, a range of $0.11-$0.12 is anticipated over the course of a month. The bullish breakout level is set at $0.11, signifying a potentially positive trend. It is crucial to note the critical support level as it can provide insights into the market's stability and potential resistance levels.

data.title: Pearson appoints Simon Robson as CFO, replacing Sally Johnson who is leaving for another role as CFO.
data.description: Today, Pearson (FTSE: PSON.L) revealed that Simon Robson will assume the position of Group Chief Financial Officer (CFO) following Sally Johnson's decision to step down. Johnson will transition to the CFO role at a significant privately owned company. This change comes as Johnson exits Pearson, a significant player in the financial world.

data.title: SOL price could hit $95-105 by March '26, currently at $87.41 with resistance at $91 and mixed signals.
data.description: The digital currency Solana is currently priced at $87.41 and is displaying conflicting indicators with a neutral Relative Strength Index (RSI) and encountering significant resistance at $91. According to technical analysis, there is a possibility for SOL to aim for a range of $95 to $105 in the next four weeks if the trend shifts towards a bullish momentum.

data.title: BTC nears $70K as cautious sentiment in futures & options markets hinders rally momentum.
data.description: Investors in Bitcoin are aiming for the $70,000 mark, however, the rally has faced resistance possibly due to concerns in the futures and options markets.

data.description: The annual general meeting of Heimstaden AB (publ) with registration number 556670-0455 has been scheduled for Friday, March 27, 2026, at 10:00 a.m. Central European Time. Shareholders are requested to attend.

data.title: TAT announces Tomorrowland Thailand debut on 11-13 Dec 2026 in Wisdom Valley Pattaya, reinforcing Thailand as event hub.
data.description: A renowned electronic music festival from Belgium is set to occur from December 11th to 13th, 2026 at Wisdom Valley Pattaya. This event will feature a total of six stages and showcase iconic global productions. By hosting such a prestigious festival, Thailand aims to solidify its status as a premier Event Hub Destination. The festival is expected to draw a large international crowd and generate significant tourism and economic benefits for the region. The event is scheduled to take place in Bangkok, with the official announcement made by the Tourism Authority on February 27th, 2026.

data.title: Earendil Labs partners with WuXi XDC on WuXiTecan-2 technology platform - Feb. 27, 2026. Collaboration with stock code 2268.HK.
data.description: In Wilmington, Delaware on February 27, 2026, Earendil Labs revealed a new partnership with WuXi XDC Cayman Inc., a company listed as 2268.HK in stock markets. Earendil Labs is recognized globally for its cutting-edge AI technologies in developing advanced biologics therapeutics. This collaboration is expected to enhance the research and development efforts of both companies, leveraging WuXi XDC's proprietary methods.
